pullrequest.title: Add the concept of a sequence_index to runmanager.

content.raw:
Thanks for testing!

Yes, it’s all by design, and this is no different to what it was like before this change, except then folders could only be based on the date, now they can be based on the sequence index too.

I’ve added a 'warning' indicator icon with a tooltip to emphasise if you are using a non-default output folder:

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/6g5bg5/images/1205243120-runmanager_tooltip.png)
‌
